long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟 What's New in Water Tracker - Major Update! 🎉

🚀 We're thrilled to announce a major update to Water Tracker, packed with awesome new features and improvements! Get ready to elevate your hydration game to the next level!

New Exciting Features:

🗓️ Intuitive Date-Based Tracking: Dive into the details with our new date-based tracking! Now, you can easily navigate through your hydration history day by day. It's never been easier to keep track of your daily water intake and see your progress over time!

💧 Reset Your Water Intake History: Ever wished for a fresh start? Now you can reset all your water intake history with just a click! Whether it's a new health goal or just a desire to start over, this feature gives you the clean slate you've been looking for!

🧭 Enhanced User Experience: With dark mode enjoy a sleeker, more user-friendly interface! Our updated design is not only visually appealing but also ensures smoother navigation and interaction.

🌊 Dive into the new and improved Water Tracker and make hydration a breeze! This isn't just an update; it's a whole new wave of hydration tracking! Stay hydrated, stay healthy! 💧

___________________________________

Stay hydrated and reach your daily water intake goals with our easy-to-use water tracking extension! 

Set your own personalized water intake goals and track your progress throughout the day by adding your water intake in either ML or Cups. 

Want to track other types of beverages? No problem! Our extension also allows you to add coffee, tea, soda, and juice to your daily intake. 

Stay on top of your hydration with reminder notifications that remind you to drink water throughout the day, so you could never miss a sip!
